Summary._: ROCKAWAYS FLOOD PROTECTION  Until September 3, 2018 No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel

Description._: ROCKAWAYS FLOOD PROTECTION  Until September 3, 2018 No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel

LongDescription:
ROCKAWAYS: FLOOD PROTECTION | Until September 3, 2018
No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av
No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel


[A] trains run between Inwood-207 St, Manhattan and Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St, Queens.

The [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle runs, approximately every 15 minutes, between Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Far Rockaway-Mott Av service, take the [S] instead, transfer at Beach 90 St.

For Broad Channel [S] shuttle customers, take the [A] instead.

[ad] For an accessible connection between the [A] train and [S] shuttle trains, transfer at Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, 945 AM to 330 PM Coney Island-bound [D] trains run via the [N] from 36 St to Stillwell Av in Brooklyn

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, 945 AM to 330 PM Coney Island-bound [D] trains run via the [N] from 36 St to Stillwell Av in Brooklyn

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT | Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Coney Island-bound [D] trains run via the [N] from 36 St to Stillwell Av in Brooklyn


No Coney Island-bound service at 9 Av, Fort Hamilton Pkwy, 50, 55, 62, 71, 79 Sts, 18, 20 Avs, Bay Pkwy, 25 Av and Bay 50 St

Travel Alternatives
For service to these stations, take the [D] to Stillwell Av and transfer to a Norwood-bound [D].

For service from these stations, take the [D] to 36 St and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [D].

Reminder: Coney Island-bound [N] platforms at Fort Hamilton Pkwy, New Utrecht Av, 18 Av, 20 Av, Kings Hwy, Avenue U, and 86 St are closed for renovation.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, 945 AM to 330 PM Jamaica Center-bound [J] and Middle Village-bound [M] trains skip Hewes St, Lorimer St and Flushing Av in Brooklyn

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, 945 AM to 330 PM Jamaica Center-bound [J] and Middle Village-bound [M] trains skip Hewes St, Lorimer St and Flushing Av in Brooklyn

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT | Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Jamaica Center-bound [J] and Middle Village-bound [M] trains skip Hewes St, Lorimer St and Flushing Av in Brooklyn


For service to these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Myrtle Av and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [J] or [M].

For service from these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Essex St* and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [J] or Middle Village-bound [M].

*Transfer at Marcy Av with Unlimited Ride MetroCard.

Alternate travel note:
Take the B46 bus via transfer at Marcy Av or Myrtle Av.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, 945 AM to 330 PM Coney Island-bound [Q] trains run express from Prospect Park to Sheepshead Bay in Brooklyn

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, 945 AM to 330 PM Coney Island-bound [Q] trains run express from Prospect Park to Sheepshead Bay in Brooklyn

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT | Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Coney Island-bound [Q] trains run express from Prospect Park to Sheepshead Bay in Brooklyn


Trains stop at Church Av, Newkirk Plaza and Kings Hwy.

For service to Parkside Av, Beverley, Cortelyou Rds, Avenue H, Avenue J, Avenue M, Avenue U and Neck Rd, take the [Q] to Church Av, Newkirk Plaza, Kings Hwy or Sheepshead Bay and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [B]* or [Q].

For service from these stations, take the [B] or [Q] to Kings Hwy, Newkirk Plaza, Church Av or Prospect Park and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [Q].

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.
